 [Changed] Any keyboard operable user interface has a mode of operation where
the keyboard focus indicator is visible. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 
NAVIGABLE
FOCUS VISIBLE(LEVEL A)
On accessible websites...

[Changed]

Any keyboard operable user interface has a mode of operation where the keyboard
focus indicator is visible. 

These websites...

Provide ways to help users navigate, find content, and determine where they are.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
When text fields receive focus, a vertical bar is displayed in the field,
indicating that the user can insert text, OR all of the text is highlighted,
indicating that the user can type over the text. I still don't really understand
[https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Understanding/focus-visible.html#examples] Web
Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.2, W3C World Wide Web Consortium
Recommendation 27 February 2020 (https://www.w3.org/TR/2020/WD-WCAG22-20200227/,
Latest version at https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/)
